property.name: instanceName
property.description: The name suffix for this instance of AIM.

property.name: port
property.description: The port that this instance of AIM should use.

property.name: jmx.port
property.description: The port on which the JMX Server is going to listen.

property.name: prov.host
property.description: Host name of OD that this AIM should use.

property.name: prov.port
property.description: Http Port where OD is running.
